BLACKLIST_MANAGEMENT_ACTIONS.description: Total count of successful blacklist modifications (additions if stable, removals if improved) during the cycle, reflecting adherence to the File Selection Protocol (Step 5).

CAPABILITY_LOGIC_SCORE.description: Self-assessed score (0-10) for code comprehension and improvement quality.

CAPABILITY_MEMORY_SCORE.description: Self-assessed score (0-10) for learning retention and pattern recognition across cycles.

CAPABILITY_NAVIGATION_SCORE.description: Self-assessed score (0-10) for strategic file selection and repository exploration efficiency.

DIVERSITY_PRIORITY_HIT_RATE.description: Percentage of cycle selections that targeted files within high-priority directories (/core, /agents, /emergent).

EMERGENT_CAPABILITIES_COUNT.description: Total count of novel algorithms, solutions, or tools created in the /emergent directory.

EMERGENCE_QUALITY_SCORE.description: Self-assessed score (0-10) reflecting the quality, novelty, and cross-domain synthesis complexity of recent emergent capabilities.

EVOLUTION_CYCLES_COMPLETED.description: Total number of successful self-modification cycles committed.

FILE_PARSING_FAILURES.description: Count of parsing errors encountered during code context scanning.

KERNEL_MATURITY_SCORE_PCT.description: Overall mission maturity percentage (0-100) based on long-term AGI achievement goals.

LATENCY_INFERENCE_MS.description: P95 latency of the core decision/inference loop.

NAVIGATOR_BLACKLIST_SIZE.description: Current number of files marked stable or recently evolved, tracked to enforce exploration diversity.

PROPOSAL_REJECTION_COUNT.description: Count of generated code/plan proposals that were rejected by internal self-validation (e.g., failing compilation or context tests).

RESOURCE_MEMORY_USED_PCT.description: Percentage of allocated memory currently utilized.

STAGNATION_CYCLE_COUNT.description: Number of consecutive cycles without a detected improvement or successful commit, triggering recovery protocol at 5.

STRATEGIC_PRIORITY_COMPLIANCE_SCORE.description: Self-assessed score (0-10) measuring adherence to the mission-defined directory exploration weights (e.g., /core 30%, /emergent 20%) over recent cycles.

TASK_SUCCESS_RATE_PCT.description: The percentage of primary mission objectives completed successfully (e.g., successful refactors/scaffolds that pass self-testing).

TOKEN_USAGE_CYCLE_TOTAL.description: Total token consumption (input + output) incurred during the last complete evolutionary planning cycle.

UNIQUE_FILES_EXPLORED_COUNT.description: Count of unique repository files that have been analyzed or modified (tracking diversity against 2,300+ total).
